text: Les Misérables is a 2012 British musical-drama movie. It stars Anne Hathaway as Fantine, Russell Crowe as Javert, and Hugh Jackman as Jean Valjean. The movie is based on the musical of the same name, which, in turn, is based on the 1862 Victor Hugo novel, Les Misérables. Critics gave the movie good reviews. Hathaway's performance won her a Screen Actors Guild Award, a Golden Globe Award, an Academy Award, and many other awards. Jackman won a Golden Globe Award for his performance. == Other websites == * Category:2012 drama movies Category:2012 musical movies Category:Academy Award winning movies Category:2010s British drama movies Category:British musical movies Category:2010s English-language movies Category:Golden Globe Award winning movies Category:Movies set in France Category:Movies set in the 19th century Category:Screen Actors Guild Award winners Category:Movies directed by Tom Hooper
title: Les Misérables (2012 movie)
